attributes.action: Hold the CMS accountable & reform into what it says on the tin !
attributes.additional_details:
It is a widespread issue, to the tune of £4 billion, that non resident parents deceive their own families out of, enabled by an equally corrupt middle man. 
This is not just or even decent, nor is it any measure of a right minded society, to use this as a yardstick for acceptability.
Parents have a moral & legal obligation to perform certain duties, one of which is financial support. 
It's not a bargaining tool.
WE ARE THE GROWN UPS HERE
Children have rights
Adults have responsibilities.
attributes.background:
The CMS is a failure. They work in tandem with the Financial Investigations Unit & lie about this fact, stating they are enforcement not investigative, thus allowing parents liable for maintenance free to evade with impunity.
https://m.facebook.com/groups/173299229896081?ref=bookmarks

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
